citations.narrative:
In the pig enclosure there was a floor drain cover missing, exposing the pipe underneath. This created a gap that
the pigs could step into and possibly become injured. The facility needs to be maintained in good repair in order to
protect the animals from injury.
********This issue has since been corrected
An exit briefing was conducted with the facility representative.

narrative:
3.125(a)
FACILITIES, GENERAL.   
In the pig enclosure there was a floor drain cover missing, exposing the pipe underneath. This created a gap that
the pigs could step into and possibly become injured. The facility needs to be maintained in good repair in order to
protect the animals from injury. 
********This issue has since been corrected
An exit briefing was conducted with the facility representative.

species.common: DOMESTIC PIG / POTBELLY PIG / MICRO PIG
